"It's similar to Hunter's Just Guard, but you can think of it as more of a <red>defensive-offense move<c>."
"Watch the enemy's movement carefully, and try to <red>Counter<c> their attacks."

"When you are equipped with a Katana, you can press the Weapon Action button to Guard.

This reduces damage you take from the front, but be aware that attacks from the side or from behind cannot be guarded against."
"Guarding right before an enemy attack hits you causes a \"Counter\", which reduces the damage you take to 0 and responds with a counterattack."
"Also, if you perform a Counter when at maximum Gear level, you will receive a bonus to attack power and critical hit rate for a short time."
